messages.speaker: cat
messages.message: i've got a big show tonight...

messages.speaker: cat
messages.message: so i'm gonna take a nap.

messages.speaker: cat
messages.message: anyway, just make sure no one wakes me up.

messages.speaker: cat
messages.message: someone's been posting my location online...

messages.speaker: cat
messages.message: and if i wake up to some nasty fans...

messages.speaker: cat
messages.message: so make sure that doesn't happen :)

messages.speaker: gator
messages.message: i'll handle it. go take your nap.
